issue.title: [Plasma C++] Make parallel_memcopy open to user
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1803](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1803). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Some times user are working with raw data , and they want to copy data
into the buffer ,in order to make this fast , they may use the  parallel_memcopy 
method in arrow/util/memory.h to accelerate

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1803?focusedCommentId=16713991) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
If we want to make this public we should use a consistent name style "ParallelMemcpy" for the function
